958 {
959  const float scale = 1.0f / sqrtf((float)head_dim);
960  int T = num_tokens;
961  int H = num_heads;
962  int H_kv = num_kv_heads;
963  int hd = head_dim;
964  int ad = aligned_head_dim;
965  int aw = aligned_context_window;
966 
967  const size_t d_q_elems = (size_t)H * (size_t)T * (size_t)ad;
968  const size_t kv_elems = (size_t)H_kv * (size_t)T * (size_t)ad;
969  /* Zero the aligned outputs so padded lanes never leak garbage to downstream GEMMs. */
970  for (size_t idx = 0; idx < d_q_elems; ++idx) {
971  d_q[idx] = 0.0f;
972  }
973  for (size_t idx = 0; idx < kv_elems; ++idx) {
974  d_k[idx] = 0.0f;
975  d_v[idx] = 0.0f;
976  }
977 
978  // Process each query head
979  for (int h = 0; h < H; ++h) {
980  // Which KV head does this query head use?
981  int kv_h = (int)((long long)h * (long long)H_kv / (long long)H);
982 
983  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
984  // Step 1: d_weights = d_output @ V^T and d_v += weights^T @ d_output
985  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
986  // For each query position i, compute d_weights[i, j] for j <= i
987  // and accumulate d_v[j] contributions
988 
989  for (int i = 0; i < T; ++i) {
990  size_t d_out_base = qkv_index(h, i, 0, T, ad);
991 
992  for (int j = 0; j <= i; ++j) {
993  size_t v_base = qkv_index(kv_h, j, 0, T, ad);
994  size_t w_idx = score_index(h, i, j, aw);
995  float w = attn_weights[w_idx];
996 
997  // d_weights[h, i, j] = d_output[h, i, :] @ v[kv_h, j, :]^T
998  float dot = 0.0f;
999  for (int dd = 0; dd < hd; ++dd) {
1000  dot += d_output[d_out_base + dd] * v[v_base + dd];
1001  }
1002  d_scores[w_idx] = dot;
1003 
1004  // d_v[kv_h, j, :] += weights[h, i, j] * d_output[h, i, :]
1005  for (int dd = 0; dd < hd; ++dd) {
1006  d_v[v_base + dd] += w * d_output[d_out_base + dd];
1007  }
1008  }
1009 
1010  // Zero out upper triangle of d_scores
1011  for (int j = i + 1; j < T; ++j) {
1012  d_scores[score_index(h, i, j, aw)] = 0.0f;
1013  }
1014  /* Scores scratch uses aligned_context_window, zero the padded columns. */
1015  for (int j = T; j < aw; ++j) {
1016  d_scores[score_index(h, i, j, aw)] = 0.0f;
1017  }
1018  }
1019 
1020  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
1021  // Step 2: Backward through softmax (in-place on d_scores for this head)
1022  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
1023  // d_scores = softmax_backward(d_scores, attn_weights)
1024  // Formula: d_score[i,j] = w[i,j] * (d_w[i,j] - sum_k(w[i,k] * d_w[i,k]))
1025 
1026  for (int i = 0; i < T; ++i) {
1027  int base = h * aw * aw + i * aw;
1028 
1029  // Compute dot product: sum_j w[i,j] * d_w[i,j]
1030  float dot_product = 0.0f;
1031  for (int j = 0; j <= i; ++j) {
1032  float wt = attn_weights[base + j];
1033  float dw = d_scores[base + j];
1034  dot_product += wt * dw;
1035  }
1036 
1037  // Apply softmax backward formula
1038  for (int j = 0; j <= i; ++j) {
1039  float wt = attn_weights[base + j];
1040  float dw = d_scores[base + j];
1041  d_scores[base + j] = wt * (dw - dot_product);
1042  }
1043  }
1044 
1045  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
1046  // Step 3: d_q = d_scores @ K * scale
1047  // d_k += d_scores^T @ Q * scale
1048  // ----------------------------------------------------------------
1049 
1050  for (int i = 0; i < T; ++i) {
1051  size_t d_q_base = qkv_index(h, i, 0, T, ad);
1052  size_t q_base = qkv_index(h, i, 0, T, ad);
1053 
1054  // d_q[h, i, :] = sum_j d_scores[h, i, j] * k[kv_h, j, :] * scale
1055  // d_k[kv_h, j, :] += d_scores[h, i, j] * q[h, i, :] * scale
1056  for (int j = 0; j <= i; ++j) {
1057  size_t k_base = qkv_index(kv_h, j, 0, T, ad);
1058  size_t d_k_base = qkv_index(kv_h, j, 0, T, ad);
1059  float ds = d_scores[score_index(h, i, j, aw)] * scale;
1060 
1061  for (int dd = 0; dd < hd; ++dd) {
1062  d_q[d_q_base + dd] += ds * k[k_base + dd];
1063  d_k[d_k_base + dd] += ds * q[q_base + dd];
1064  }
1065  }
1066  }
1067  }
1068 }

186  __m512 up_acc = _mm512_setzero_ps();

209  if (b_up) up += b_up[j];

558

561  }
562  // Handle remaining elements
563  for (; i < n; ++i) {
564  float x = input[i];
565  float s = 1.0f / (1.0f + expf(-beta * x));
566  float gelu_derivative = s * (1.0f + x * (1.0f - s) * beta);
567  d_input[i] = d_output[i] * gelu_derivative;
568  }
569 
570 #else
571  // Scalar fallback
572  for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
573  float x = input[i];
574  float s = 1.0f / (1.0f + expf(-beta * x));
575  float gelu_derivative = s * (1.0f + x * (1.0f - s) * beta);

285  __m256 m_vec = _mm256_set1_ps(m);
286  d = 0;
287  for (; d + 8 <= D; d += 8) {
288  __m256 xv = _mm256_loadu_ps(&x[d]);
289  __m256 dyv = _mm256_loadu_ps(&dY[d]);
290  __m256 gv = _mm256_loadu_ps(&gamma[d]);
291  __m256 dgv = _mm256_loadu_ps(&d_gamma[d]);
292 
293  __m256 x_hat = _mm256_mul_ps(xv, rstd_vec);
294 
295  // dX = rstd * (dY * gamma - x_hat * m)
296  __m256 dy_g = _mm256_mul_ps(dyv, gv);
297  __m256 xhat_m = _mm256_mul_ps(x_hat, m_vec);
298  __m256 diff = _mm256_sub_ps(dy_g, xhat_m);
299  __m256 dxv = _mm256_mul_ps(rstd_vec, diff);
300  _mm256_storeu_ps(&dX[d], dxv);
301 
302  // d_gamma += dY * x_hat
303  __m256 dy_xhat = _mm256_mul_ps(dyv, x_hat);
304  dgv = _mm256_add_ps(dgv, dy_xhat);
305  _mm256_storeu_ps(&d_gamma[d], dgv);
306  }
307  // Handle remaining elements
308  for (; d < D; ++d) {
309  float x_hat = x[d] * rstd;
310  float dy = dY[d];
311  dX[d] = rstd * (dy * gamma[d] - x_hat * m);
312  d_gamma[d] += dy * x_hat;
313  }
314 
315 #else
316  // Scalar fallback
317  // Compute m = (1/D) * sum_j (dY_j * gamma_j * x_hat_j)
318  double sum_dY_g_xhat = 0.0;
319  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d) {
320  float x_hat = x[d] * rstd;
321  sum_dY_g_xhat += (double)dY[d] * (double)gamma[d] * (double)x_hat;
322  }
323  float m = (float)(sum_dY_g_xhat / (double)D);
324 
325  // Compute dX and accumulate dGamma
326  for (int d = 0; d < D; ++d) {
327  float x_hat = x[d] * rstd;
328  float dy = dY[d];
329  dX[d] = rstd * (dy * gamma[d] - x_hat * m);
330  d_gamma[d] += dy * x_hat;
331  }
332 #endif
333 
334  // Zero padding gradients (if any)
335  for (int d = D; d < aligned; ++d) {
336  dX[d] = 0.0f;
337  }
338  }
